# Mark of the Wild (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Dr

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Dragonmarked (WotC), pg. 152

*Your dragonmark grows warm. Dangerous animals nearby no longer regard you as a threat.*

For the duration of the spell, no animal threatens or attacks you unless you attack it first. The spellâ€™s duration depends on the strength of your dragonmark.


| **Dragonmark** | **Duration** |
|---|---|
| Least | 1 minute/level |
| Lesser | 10 minute/level |
| Greater or Siberys | 1 hour/level |

If you attack any animal, the spell ends immediately.

*Dragonmark:* Any true or aberrant dragonmark.
